/usr/bin/c++    -std=c++11 -g   CMakeFiles/Newcaps.dir/Newcaps.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Newcaps.dir/checksum.c.o CMakeFiles/Newcaps.dir/hash.c.o CMakeFiles/Newcaps.dir/http_parser.c.o CMakeFiles/Newcaps.dir/ip_fragment.c.o CMakeFiles/Newcaps.dir/ip_options.c.o CMakeFiles/Newcaps.dir/tcp.c.o CMakeFiles/Newcaps.dir/util.c.o CMakeFiles/Newcaps.dir/libnids.c.o  -o ../bin/Newcaps -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/lib -lpcap /usr/local/lib/libgthread-2.0.so /usr/local/lib/libglib-2.0.so
